mapper.select: select a.ProductId, group_concat(b.CategoryName Separator ' ') as CategoryNames, max(b.Weight) as maxWeight FROM yjj_ProductCategory a, yjj_Category b where a.CategoryId = b.Id and a.status > -1 group by ProductId;

SELECT a.*, b.ProductId FROM yjj_Category a RIGHT JOIN (SELECT * FROM yjj_ProductCategory b WHERE ProductId in
#{productId} ) AS b ON a.Id = b.CategoryId WHERE a.CategoryType = 2 and b.status=0 order by b.createTime desc
